thread.section_title: Fast Capital 360 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Capital 360 | fastcapital360.com
thread.title: Miguel

author: Miguel
title: Miguel
text: We worked with Kris DiRenzo and we are very happy with his professionalism and customer service. He made sure to listen to our specific needs and get us the best funding program to target our request. He explained with great detail the process and what to expect. Even if he had to explain everything more than once, he didn't hesitate to help us understand it all. As we worked with him we also worked with other financing companies to compare the offers and choose the one that would benefit us the best. By far he was right on point on everything he told us and it turned out that choosing Fast Capital 360 was our best option. We are glad to have worked with such an amazing individual and company! Thank you!
